title: R package n2khab: providing preprocessed reference data for Flemish Natura 2000 habitat analyses
description: The n2khab package is an R package with preprocessing functions and standard reference data, useful for analyses regarding Flemish Natura 2000 habitats and regionally important biotopes (RIBs). URL: https://inbo.github.io/n2khab.

creators.name: Vanderhaeghe, Floris
